DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study assess usability long-term store H5N1 antigen adjuvant . The study design assist stockpile management assess safety , reactogenicity , immunogenicity long-term store influenza A/Vietnam/H5N1 vaccine administer without MF59® adjuvant .
DOC.brief_title: Assess Safety & Immunogenicity Stored Inactivated Influenza H5N1 Virus Vaccine Given With & Without Stored MF59 Adjuvant
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize , double-blinded , Phase 2 study ass safety immunogenicity 2 dose long-term store inactivated monovalent influenza A/Vietnam/H5N1 virus vaccine administer intramuscularly without MF59 adjuvant healthy male nonpregnant female , age 18 49 year , inclusive . This study design assist stockpile management assess usability long-term store H5N1 antigen ( ie , store > 10 year ) adjuvant ( ie , store > 5 year ) .
DOC.criteria: Male nonpregnant female Provide write informed consent prior studyrelated procedure Stable health status Access consistent reliable mean telephone contact Able understand comply plan study procedure Agree stay contact site , plan move study area study duration Allergic egg , vaccine component , squalenebased adjuvant Women positive pregnancy test within 24 hour vaccination , breastfeed Females childbearing potential refuse acceptable birth control , sexually active , used birth control 2 month prior study entry Have immunosuppression use anticancer chemotherapy radiation therapy within precede 36 month Have active neoplastic disease history hematologic malignancy Have long term use ( ≥14 consecutive day ) glucocorticoid ( > 20 mg/day ) highdose inhaled steroid ( > 800 mcg/day ) within precede 6 month Diagnosis schizophrenia , bipolar disease , major psychiatric diagnosis Have hospitalize psychiatric illness , attempt suicide deem danger self others within past 10 year
